text.section:
An applicant for a permit shall:
submit to the Board an application on the form that the Board provides; and
pay to the Board a nonrefundable application fee set by the Board.

In addition to any other information required on an application form, the form shall require:
for a partnership applicant, a list of each partner who practices or who intends to practice certified public accountancy in the State;
for a limited liability company, a list of each member who practices or who intends to practice certified public accountancy in the State; and
for a corporate applicant, a list of all of the shareholders of the corporation.
